summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5719 for the improvement of The Alley in Blocks 32, 33 and 34, Woodlawn Addition to Green Lake, being the alley between East 72nd Street, and East 73rd Street, from Woodlawn Avenue to 5th Avenue Northeast; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 75539, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
